Author: livipup
Text: Dang, I just got size 00 pants for the first time. I kind of feel like I'm too thin already, but my ED brain says that sounds blessed. I'm not sure it could ever happen though. They're high-waisted and there's no way my hips will ever get down to 23" so realistically I could only hope to get small enough for them to be a bit loose like my size 0 jeans are now
